response.original_title: Shock Video Refried: The Best of the Worst
response.overview: Over the years, Shock Video has tackled the Herculean task of bringing HBO viewers the most titillating, tawdry and (sometimes) tasteless clips ever shown on TV around the globe. This special - compiled by a crack staff of "sexperts" - presents a collection of the ultimate clips from the Shock Video archives. Some of the segments include: a Hungarian show in which lusty women mount camels in the desert, a Russian lonely-hearts dating program, a topless all-girl soccer game between Italy and Brazil, a Japanese woman who breaks chopsticks with her buns of steel, and a bearded naked dancer named Gustaf.
response.title: Shock Video Refried: The Best of the Worst
